fileList.contents:
# Service Usage
This service (known as SV081) is used to match client and application information data against a set of pre-defined risk profiles. Safeguards will extract the request data into individual characterisitcs which are then matched against a set of pre-defined risk profiles. If there is a profile match (ie. the data characterisitcs are present in the request message) Safeguards will return a match indicator, as well as treatment information on the risk.
